We help you become the best version of you.

Let us show you how.

Sign up for a free fundamentals session Free fundamentals session

For Everyday People

BENt on Crossfit is for anyone keen to be the best they can be physically and mentally. Our members are a mix of males and females aged 15 to 55 of all shapes and sizes. And you don’t have to be fit to start. But you will get fit – quickly!

We focus on your health, fitness and happiness. Our community helps people form lasting friendships and feel supported. At BentonCrossfit the person next to you is just as valuable as the coach looking after you.

Body movement is complicated so we take the time and care to teach you at your pace. We encourage you to work as hard as you can to get the most out of workouts but we always look out for your welfare.

To Advanced

If you have a sporting background and you are looking to get better, our advanced workouts are a great way to push your skills to new heights. Our coaches include world class athletes who compete in national and international competitions.

Our Philosophy

You aren't just looking at another gym. You'll definitely throw weights around, run, jump, sweat, grunt and groan. But you'll do it with some new friends.

You will work really hard. Sometimes you'll feel like giving up, but we'll always be there to help you. You'll do things you find easy and things that you find difficult. We'll continue to encourage and teach you until you perfect it.

We'll teach you CrossFit: a functional fitness program, but more than that we'll empower you to take control of your life, both mentally and physically. The workouts are really challenging but with the support of our community you'll always make it out the other side. And be better for it.

Excellent Facilities

We have state of the art equipment that helps you to feel safe and secure when working out.

Great Programming

We scale or adapt every workout to meet your abilities, always pushing you forward.

Helpful Trainers

Our trainers are here to help you learn the correct techniques and increase your functional fitness.

Great Community

Make new friends in the Southern Highlands. BENtOnCrossFit is more then a gym, it's a community.

Our Facility

We offer a fun, friendly environment in which to train. You will find kettlebells, dumbbells, wallballs, rowers and plenty of conditioning equipment.

Our full size rig and 20ft ropes (for climbing) add an extra set of challenges.

What You Get

  • Become part of a supportive community of like minded individuals
  • 20 x classes p/week
  • 1 x Specialist workshop p/week
  • 1 x Hero workout Saturday's
  • Online Private Educational Forum
  • Highly qualified instructors
  • Professional programming

Meet Our Team

Ben Garard

Head Coach

15th Fittest Man on Earth 2015 at CrossFit Games

  • Represented Australia at CrossFit Invitational 2015
  • 5th at CrossFit Games Australia Regional 2015
  • 11th at CrossFit Games Australia Regional 2014
  • Part of San Fran Fire NPGL Team

Ben is one of the best CrossFit competitors in the world. He finished 15th in the 2015 CrossFit Games and represented Australia at the CrossFit Invitational.

His approach to fitness is second to none, which is reflected in the results that BentonCrossfit members achieve. Ben prides himself on helping others achieve their goals in fitness goals.

Ricky Garard

Ricky is an up and coming CrossFit star and has recently furthered his CrossFit career winning high level competitions and qualifying for competitions in the USA.

1st Place - "Mens Fitness" Fit Bloke Challenge.
1st Place - Olympus Unleashed 'Advanced'
Wodapalooza 2015-MIAMI Fitness Festival-Qualifier
OC Throwdown 2015 Qualifier

Cindy Garard

Cindy has always had a passion for helping others, having recently become qualified as an Occupational Therapist. This has influenced her role as a CrossFit coach.

Olympus Unleashed 2014 -1st Place
Let's Start a Riot 2014 - 3rd Place
Shape Fit Chick Challenge Syd 2014 - 6th place
Shape Fit Chick Challenge Melb 2014 - 7th place
